channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: Horrible Histories charts the contribution of Black people to British life throughout history. How did African soldiers come to be guarding Hadrian?s Wall? Why was a West African diver asked to help salvage Henry VIII's ship, the Mary Rose? And the actor Ira Aldridge tells us how he came to leave New York to find fame in 19th-century England.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: The gang produce a hand-drawn comic which is a surprise hit all round Beanotown. Envious of their success, Walter embarks on a mission of cartoon-drawing sabotage.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Penfold takes a trip inside Danger Mouse's body to save him from a deadly aversion to his own heroism.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: With their juice bar empty, a grandma and granddaughter ask the Ninjas for a mariachi band to entice customers - but Konpeki?s trumpet playing threatens the delivery.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Bitzer is embarrassed when his dad makes a surprise visit and finds the farmyard in a mess. Feeling sorry for Bitzer, Shaun and the flock make a real show of tidying up. Bitzer and his dad get some bonding time, but the place descends into anarchy once more as soon as his dad leaves.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings decide to play hide-and-seek in the Savannah.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: When Boy's school Bobblehead Head Club is closed down due to not having enough members, his siblings help make the boring club more fun.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Herbert is really proud of the plants he has grown ready for a visit from The Complete Gnome Gardener magazine. However, when a Wind Dragon flies through the forest destroying all his hard work, Herbert turns to desperate measures ? a barrowful of Stinkweasel?s stinkiest compost! Now, the whole forest is at risk of being overwhelmed by the smell, and the heroes must quest to get rid of it.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Mobile Unit goes undercover as villains to try and stop The Shadow.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Odd Squad investigates strange events. The agents try to escape from a time loop.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: A walkie-talkie hidden inside a chili dog causes Harold to worry an alien has arrived.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Ladybug, Cat Noir and Rena Rouge face Sentibubbler.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Go Get Arty
channel.desc: The Kwapongs build magical fairy houses, internet star DanTDM shows how to draw a gaming pug, and artist Rong Bao?s inflatable art really pops.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Malory Towers
channel.desc: Angry about not receiving a present from Paris, Celeste hides in the stables. However, she is trapped there with Matron when the stables catch fire.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: A-Troupe?s latest victory is cut short after an Absolute Dance rules change shakes things up. Now, winning regionals isn?t just about their reputation, it's also about saving the studio.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter Challenges
channel.desc: Gladiators? stars Apollo and Electro surprise children in a Salford school when they lead a PE lesson with a difference.
